tech_news.title: Sony is taking $100 off its PS5 consoles for Black Friday - The Verge
tech_news.description: Sony is cutting the prices of its PS5 consoles, accessories, and games for Black Friday. PS5 consoles are temporarily dropping by $100.

tech_news.title: In the wake of Battlefield 6 and Arc Radiers, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 suffered a much smaller launch than previous CoD games - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Activision's own response to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's release seems more muted than previous years.

tech_news.title: Google Issues Security Fix for Actively Exploited Chrome V8 Zero-Day Vulnerability - The Hacker News
